Question: Shenzhen Wirentech Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Wirentech Co., Ltd.

Battery Products at CES 2024

- Lithium Ion and LiFePO4 battery technology
- UL1973 and TUV IEC62619 certified
- Innovative lithium cells welding technology
- Focus on lithium battery configuration and technology
- Expected to showcase latest battery technology and products at CES 2024
